_source.text: 7 Myths About Filing Bankruptcy MYTH 1: It is better to work out your debt, use debt relief agencies or debt consolidation, or to enter into debt payment programs instead of filing bankruptcy, or I am a licensed debt counselor.

text: 7 Myths About **Filing** Bankruptcy MYTH 1: It **is** **better** to work out your debt, use debt relief
agencies or debt **consolidation**, or to enter into debt payment programs instead of **filing** bankruptcy, or I am a licensed debt counselor.
